name: RichAI
description: What is the project about? AI-powered Image generator & Voice GPT assistant. Smarter conversations with our crypto Chatbot, talking Avatar and advanced NLP technology. What makes your project unique? • Our mobile app combines ChatGPT and Stable Diffusion with voice recognition, enabling intelligent and personalized conversations on a variety of topics. • Customize t-shirts and hoodies with your AI-generated artwork using our POD services for delivery to your doorstep. • Crypto related Chat assistant. History of your project. Built by the investdex.io team that have created A 9 EVM compatible data aggregation charting solutions. What’s next for your project? Migration to PulseChain as soon as Main net is live. What can your token be used for? To access all premium AI models of RichAI.app
